title: League of Legends Nostalgia, anyone?
body:
My nostalgia:

Back in the days when I played ‘Classic’ Shyvana

I was a red fiery dragon girl who always had red particles. Whenever I drank red pot (RIP Elixir of Fortitude), had old Sunfire Cape on and activated my W and Q, I would be surrounded by a beautiful aura of red around Shyvana.

Now her classic art got changed (I still like the old one :’( ) and I can’t bear to play with her classic. I do have Ice Drake but not only did this ruin the fiery theme but even the visuals of Sunfire Cape become more boring (I agree how the old one looked like a debuff, but it made you look so much cooler, especially when I always rushed Sunfire on Warlord Shen because it looks so beast).

I want to go back in the days where Sunfire looked like you were on fire, when Shyvana had her old classic and when Elixir of Fortitude existed :’(


Anyone share this nostalgia with me? What are your nostalgic memories of LoL?




(RIP old Yi model and old Pantheon art)
